titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit certain volunteer fire departments to issue tax-exempt bonds for purposes of acquiring ambulances or other emergency response vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit the issuance of tax-exempt bonds by volunteer fire departments to acquire ambulances or other emergency response vehicles.
